Nib
  • Nib  
  • nib.views.base module

nib.views.base module

Base View class for Nib views with declarative parameter-based styling.

This module provides the View base class that all Nib UI components inherit from. It implements the modifier system that allows styling views through constructor parameters.

The View class handles:

  • Modifier application (layout, appearance, animation)

  • View tree serialization for the Swift runtime

  • Reactive updates when properties change

  • Background and overlay view composition

Design Philosophy:

Nib uses a declarative parameter-based API instead of method chaining. All styling is done through constructor parameters, making the code more readable and easier to understand.

Example

Styling with constructor parameters:

# Instead of: Text("Hello").font(.title).foregroundColor(.blue)
# Nib uses:
nib.Text(
    "Hello",
    font=nib.Font.TITLE,
    foreground_color=nib.Color.BLUE,
    padding=16,
)

Container with background:

nib.VStack(
    controls=[nib.Text("Item 1"), nib.Text("Item 2")],
    spacing=8,
    background=nib.RoundedRectangle(corner_radius=10, fill="#333"),
    padding=16,
)
class nib.views.base.View(width=None, height=None, min_width=None, min_height=None, max_width=None, max_height=None, padding=None, background=None, foreground_color=None, fill=None, stroke=None, stroke_width=None, opacity=None, corner_radius=None, font=None, font_weight=None, clip_shape=None, shadow_color=None, shadow_radius=None, shadow_x=None, shadow_y=None, border_color=None, border_width=None, animation=None, content_transition=None, transition=None, blend_mode=None, scale=None, overlay=None, on_drop=None)[source]

Bases: object

Base class for all Nib views.

All Nib UI components inherit from View and share a common set of modifier parameters for styling. Views are styled through constructor parameters rather than method chaining.

_type

The SwiftUI view type name (e.g., Text, VStack).

_id

Position-based identifier assigned during tree traversal.

_modifiers

List of modifier dictionaries to apply.

_app

Reference to the parent App for triggering re-renders.

Modifier Parameters:
Layout:

  • width, height: Fixed dimensions in points

  • min_width, min_height: Minimum dimensions

  • max_width, max_height: Maximum dimensions (use infinity for max)

  • padding: Uniform float or dict with sides

Appearance:

  • background: Color or View for background

  • foreground_color: Text/content color

  • fill, stroke, stroke_width: Shape fill and stroke

  • opacity: View opacity (0.0 - 1.0)

  • corner_radius: Corner rounding in points

Typography:

  • font: Font instance or system font name

  • font_weight: FontWeight enum or string

Effects:

  • shadow_color, shadow_radius, shadow_x, shadow_y: Drop shadow

  • border_color, border_width: Border styling

  • clip_shape: Clip view to shape (circle, capsule, or View)

  • blend_mode: Layer blending mode

  • scale: Scale transform

Animation:

  • animation: Animation configuration

  • content_transition: How content changes animate

  • transition: How view appearance/disappearance animates

Interaction:

  • on_drop: Callback for drag-and-drop file handling

Example

Basic text styling:

nib.Text(
    "Hello World",
    font=nib.Font.TITLE,
    foreground_color=nib.Color.BLUE,
    padding=16,
)

Container with complex styling:

nib.VStack(
    controls=[...],
    spacing=8,
    background=nib.RoundedRectangle(
        corner_radius=10,
        fill="#262626",
        stroke_color="#383837",
    ),
    shadow_radius=5,
    shadow_y=2,
)
Parameters:

  • width (Optional[float])

  • height (Optional[float])

  • min_width (Optional[float])

  • min_height (Optional[float])

  • max_width (Union[float, str, None])

  • max_height (Union[float, str, None])

  • padding (Union[float, dict, None])

  • background (Union[str, Color, None])

  • foreground_color (Union[str, Color, None])

  • fill (Union[str, Color, None])

  • stroke (Union[str, Color, None])

  • stroke_width (Optional[float])

  • opacity (Optional[float])

  • corner_radius (Optional[float])

  • font (Union[str, Font, None])

  • font_weight (Union[FontWeight, str, None])

  • clip_shape (Union[str, View, None])

  • shadow_color (Optional[str])

  • shadow_radius (Optional[float])

  • shadow_x (Optional[float])

  • shadow_y (Optional[float])

  • border_color (Union[str, Color, None])

  • border_width (Optional[float])

  • animation (Optional[Animation])

  • content_transition (Union[ContentTransition, str, None])

  • transition (Union[Transition, str, None])

  • blend_mode (Union[BlendMode, str, None])

  • scale (Optional[float])

  • overlay (Optional[View])

  • on_drop (Optional[Callable[[List[str]], None]])

Initialize a View with modifier parameters.

Parameters:

  • width (Optional[float]) Fixed width in points.

  • height (Optional[float]) Fixed height in points.

  • min_width (Optional[float]) Minimum width in points.

  • min_height (Optional[float]) Minimum height in points.

  • max_width (Union[float, str, None]) Maximum width in points, or infinity.

  • max_height (Union[float, str, None]) Maximum height in points, or infinity.

  • padding (Union[float, dict, None]) Padding around content. Either a uniform float or a dict with keys: top, bottom, leading, trailing, horizontal, vertical.

  • background (Union[str, Color, None]) Background color (string or Color) or a View.

  • foreground_color (Union[str, Color, None]) Content/text color.

  • fill (Union[str, Color, None]) Fill color for shapes.

  • stroke (Union[str, Color, None]) Stroke color for shapes.

  • stroke_width (Optional[float]) Stroke width for shapes.

  • opacity (Optional[float]) View opacity from 0.0 (transparent) to 1.0 (opaque).

  • corner_radius (Optional[float]) Corner rounding in points.

  • font (Union[str, Font, None]) Font instance or system font name.

  • font_weight (Union[FontWeight, str, None]) Text weight (FontWeight enum or string).

  • clip_shape (Union[str, View, None]) Clip to shape (circle, capsule, or a shape View).

  • shadow_color (Optional[str]) Shadow color.

  • shadow_radius (Optional[float]) Shadow blur radius.

  • shadow_x (Optional[float]) Shadow horizontal offset.

  • shadow_y (Optional[float]) Shadow vertical offset.

  • border_color (Union[str, Color, None]) Border color.

  • border_width (Optional[float]) Border width.

  • animation (Optional[Animation]) Animation configuration for property changes.

  • content_transition (Union[ContentTransition, str, None]) Animation for content changes.

  • transition (Union[Transition, str, None]) Animation for view appearance/disappearance.

  • blend_mode (Union[BlendMode, str, None]) Layer blending mode.

  • scale (Optional[float]) Scale transform factor.

  • overlay (Optional[View]) View to render on top of this view.

  • on_drop (Optional[Callable[[List[str]], None]]) Callback for drag-and-drop file handling.

__init__(width=None, height=None, min_width=None, min_height=None, max_width=None, max_height=None, padding=None, background=None, foreground_color=None, fill=None, stroke=None, stroke_width=None, opacity=None, corner_radius=None, font=None, font_weight=None, clip_shape=None, shadow_color=None, shadow_radius=None, shadow_x=None, shadow_y=None, border_color=None, border_width=None, animation=None, content_transition=None, transition=None, blend_mode=None, scale=None, overlay=None, on_drop=None)[source]

Initialize a View with modifier parameters.

Parameters:

  • width (Optional[float]) Fixed width in points.

  • height (Optional[float]) Fixed height in points.

  • min_width (Optional[float]) Minimum width in points.

  • min_height (Optional[float]) Minimum height in points.

  • max_width (Union[float, str, None]) Maximum width in points, or infinity.

  • max_height (Union[float, str, None]) Maximum height in points, or infinity.

  • padding (Union[float, dict, None]) Padding around content. Either a uniform float or a dict with keys: top, bottom, leading, trailing, horizontal, vertical.

  • background (Union[str, Color, None]) Background color (string or Color) or a View.

  • foreground_color (Union[str, Color, None]) Content/text color.

  • fill (Union[str, Color, None]) Fill color for shapes.

  • stroke (Union[str, Color, None]) Stroke color for shapes.

  • stroke_width (Optional[float]) Stroke width for shapes.

  • opacity (Optional[float]) View opacity from 0.0 (transparent) to 1.0 (opaque).

  • corner_radius (Optional[float]) Corner rounding in points.

  • font (Union[str, Font, None]) Font instance or system font name.

  • font_weight (Union[FontWeight, str, None]) Text weight (FontWeight enum or string).

  • clip_shape (Union[str, View, None]) Clip to shape (circle, capsule, or a shape View).

  • shadow_color (Optional[str]) Shadow color.

  • shadow_radius (Optional[float]) Shadow blur radius.

  • shadow_x (Optional[float]) Shadow horizontal offset.

  • shadow_y (Optional[float]) Shadow vertical offset.

  • border_color (Union[str, Color, None]) Border color.

  • border_width (Optional[float]) Border width.

  • animation (Optional[Animation]) Animation configuration for property changes.

  • content_transition (Union[ContentTransition, str, None]) Animation for content changes.

  • transition (Union[Transition, str, None]) Animation for view appearance/disappearance.

  • blend_mode (Union[BlendMode, str, None]) Layer blending mode.

  • scale (Optional[float]) Scale transform factor.

  • overlay (Optional[View]) View to render on top of this view.

  • on_drop (Optional[Callable[[List[str]], None]]) Callback for drag-and-drop file handling.

to_dict(path='0')[source]

Convert the view to a dictionary for serialization.

Serializes the view and its children into a dictionary structure that can be sent to the Swift runtime via MessagePack.

Parameters:

path (str) Position-based path for stable view identity (e.g., 0, 0.0, 0.1.2).

Return type:

dict

Returns:

Dictionary containing id, type, props, children, modifiers, and optional backgroundView/overlayView.
